title: Centralized log management (Graylog, Logstash, Fluentd)
summary: This Quarkus guide explains the process of sending logs to centralized management systems such as Graylog, Logstash, and Fluentd using the 'quarkus-logging-gelf' extension. It covers setups for different logging environments using Docker, configuration details, and includes clear examples on how to integrate these systems into your Quarkus application for effective log management.
